reviewText: Thanks for the order as promisd, law
Terrible head the warning don't buy all 1979 footage poor photography bad music what a waste of money

This DVD was released in 2008 but it is 1979 footage! It's not even all action film, you spend time viewing at a bunch of lists. Looks like it was shot with a prehistoric home movie camera, no dialogue. A BIG disappointment. I have been robbed on this purchase.
I never received this DVD. It was a Christmas present. I was issued a refund.

To say this series is bad, is an understatement.  The picture makes it look like a recent production that covers the USAF's history. Not! It is nothing but old promotional clips from the 60's and 70's. If you need a copy, you can find mine in a dumpster.
